attributes.action: Stop Birmingham City Council building Birmingham City a new stadium
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Birmingham city council yet again or certain councillors who have a conflict of interest are determined to build Birmingham City a 'free' stadium. This action alienates 75% of the population as it favours one club over another and canoot be construed as being in the public interest but only serving the interests of BCFC and certain councillors.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop Birmingham City Council building Birmingham City a new stadium."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16479


Prime Minister's Office
